name: @mayajs/router
description: Simple NodeJS routing library created using Typescript

scripts.clean: rimraf interface && rimraf index.js && rimraf index.d.ts && rimraf utils && rimraf router && rimraf lib
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run tgz && tsc -w
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run package && tsc --outDir .

author: Mark Anthony C. Ignacio
